customblocker.name: The Cube
customblocker.description: Behold, the Cube!

customblocker.name: Painting of Kolzar the Magnificent
customblocker.description: A lesser-known wizard with a cult following. I still prefer Triangulon.

customblocker.name: Wizardly Cask
customblocker.description: Sometimes wizards get together to replenish their mana, tell rude jokes and fall over.

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: OMG is that Triangulon? He's so dreamy.

customblocker.name: Wizarding Degree
customblocker.description: A bachelor's of sorcery (BSc.) from "Bortwain's Distance School of Wizardry."

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: It's always 5:00 p.m. somewhere in the multiverse.

customblocker.name: Painting of the Hyperpope
customblocker.description: Wizards disagree widely on the current Hyperpope's legitimacy, but his choice of headwear is universally respected and admired nonetheless.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: It's always 5:00 p.m. somewhere in the multiverse.

customblocker.name: Long-dead Wizard
customblocker.description: No amount of sorcery could save this wizard from the ravages of time.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: A little mana is a dangerous thing.

customblocker.name: A Police Box?
customblocker.description: The wizards have the box!

action.text: A bright light scans the room and the faint sounds of dot matrix machinery can be heard.

customengraving.name: Rune of Ominous Warning
customengraving.description: It's a trap.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Wizards can stop drinking anytime they want.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Looks like someone was running pretty low on mana.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Wizards don't have a problem.

customblocker.name: Distillomancer's Workbench
customblocker.description: It appears as though someone was producing a potent brew.

customblocker.name: Inactive Crystalline Node
customblocker.description: This crystal node powers abstract arcane machinery. It is currently inactive.

customblocker.name: Active Crystalline Node
customblocker.description: This crystal node powers abstract arcane machinery. It pulses with thaumaturgic current.

action.text: You are drunk with thaumaturgic energy! You taste cherries and mild chocolate with a rich finish. 88 points.

customblocker.name: The Bomb
customblocker.description: An object of fear and awe among digglekind, it is said this terrible device is capable of displacing massive amounts of earth almost instantaneously.

customblocker.name: Diabolical Sconce
customblocker.description: This sconce casts a dim light over your hellish surroundings.

room.name: Medium Shrine of the Diggle God of Hell

customblocker.name: Infernal Throne
customblocker.description: From atop his throne, Vlad Digula, Prince of Diggle Hell, rules over his prison.

customengraving.name: Ex-Wizard
customengraving.description: When Wizardkings duel, they don't fool around.

customengraving.name: Ex-Wizard
customengraving.description: Wizardkings sometimes get rowdy when drunk.

customengraving.name: Summoning Circle
customengraving.description: It hums with magic power. You wonder just what is missing to complete the summoning.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: They're not working, and you're not an authorized repair service.

customblocker.name: Portal
customblocker.description: Either this is broken, or it's a really short-range portal.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: The console is flashing 'PC LOAD LETTER'.

customblocker.name: Portal
customblocker.description: Hopefully it's not working from the other side as well.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: It's in diagnostic mode. Some problem with CONFIG.SYS.

customblocker.name: Portal
customblocker.description: This portal's days of sending stab-happy fools into unknown dimensions are over.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: Unfortunately, Electronics is not a skill tree.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: Maybe if you tried zapping the PRAM?

customblocker.name: Discharged Crystal Node
customblocker.description: This one is all out of magic smoke.

customblocker.name: Discharged Crystal Node
customblocker.description: No signal.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: They're not working, and you're not an authorized repair service.

customblocker.name: Workbench
customblocker.description: Apparently, sufficiently advanced magic is indistinguishable from technology.

customblocker.name: Workbench
customblocker.description: Apparently, sufficiently advanced magic is indistinguishable from technology.

customblocker.name: Workbench
customblocker.description: Apparently, sufficiently advanced magic is indistinguishable from technology.

customblocker.name: Astrological Banner
customblocker.description: This is important. This means something.

customblocker.name: Astrological Banner
customblocker.description: Something is in conjunction with something and opposition with something else.

customblocker.name: Astrological Banner
customblocker.description: You're actually not sure which planets orbit your sun, actually.

customblocker.name: Astrological Banner
customblocker.description: Wizardking astrology is ages beyond that of regular mortal astrology.

customblocker.name: Aetheric Field Aemitter
customblocker.description: This gently humming thaumomechanical device emits invisible fields of arcane energy. When you try to touch it, your fingers go numb and then are gently pushed away by some unseen force.

customblocker.name: Aetheric Field Aemitter
customblocker.description: This gently humming thaumomechanical device emits invisible fields of arcane energy. When you try to touch it, your fingers go numb and then are gently pushed away by some unseen force.

customblocker.name: Aetheric Field Aemitter
customblocker.description: This gently humming thaumomechanical device emits invisible fields of arcane energy. When you try to touch it, your fingers go numb and then are gently pushed away by some unseen force.

customblocker.name: Aetheric Field Aemitter
customblocker.description: This gently humming thaumomechanical device emits invisible fields of arcane energy. When you try to touch it, your fingers go numb and then are gently pushed away by some unseen force.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flit arcanely around and around, as though they were being manipulated by some mystical force.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flit arcanely around and around, as though they were being manipulated by some mystical force.

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: OMG is that Triangulon? Makes me wish I was just a little more equilateral, if you know what I mean.

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: Triangulon! It's the picture from when he was on the cover of Mathemagic Beat!

customblocker.name: Painting of Triangulon
customblocker.description: This picture of triangulon is covered with lipstick stains.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: My heart skips a beat when I think that about how triangulon's famously angular lips may have touched this bottle.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: Just enough light to see the buttons on the vending machine. You know how hard it is to read small print when you need a fix and your eyes are blurry.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: Just enough light to see the buttons on the vending machine. You know how hard it is to read small print when you need a fix and your eyes are blurry.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: This particular candle serves no useful purpose whatsoever.

customblocker.name: Magic Sconce
customblocker.description: This particular candle serves no useful purpose whatsoever.

customblocker.name: Extremely Stubborn Trap
customblocker.description: An uber trap is stubbornly guarding this specific bit of floor. No amount of tinkering or thievery is likely to persuade it to move or deactivate.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

action.text: You have been blasted by Krong's favorite firetrap! Consider it a blessing! Krong don't suffer no sissies.

customblocker.name: Painting of a Tiger
customblocker.description: This reminds me of a story I read somewhere. I'd share it with you, but I can't quite remember how it ends.

customblocker.name: Tiger Portrait
customblocker.description: As it turns out, this was actually a much easier decision than the one in that story.

action.text: My it got bright in here all of a sudden!

customblocker.name: Fleshsmith's Worktable
customblocker.description: Covered with gooey bits of past experiments, and the mystic residues they left behind.

customengraving.name: Cupboard
customengraving.description: It is a rare phenomenon, but not unheard of, for a wizard to have a little food with their booze.

customengraving.name: Cupboard
customengraving.description: It is a rare phenomenon, but not unheard of, for a wizard to have a little food with their booze.

custombreakable.name: Cupboard
custombreakable.description: It is a rare phenomenon, but not unheard of, for a wizard to have a little food with their booze.

custombreakable.name: Cupboard
custombreakable.description: It is a rare phenomenon, but not unheard of, for a wizard to have a little food with their booze.

customblocker.name: Dining Nook Table
customblocker.description: Covered with footprints from all those times some drunk wizard has climbed on top of it during a wild party.

customblocker.name: Dirty Couch
customblocker.description: It's been literally aeons since anyone vacuumed under or between these cushions.

customblocker.name: Dirty Couch
customblocker.description: It's been literally aeons since anyone vacuumed under or between these cushions.

customblocker.name: Mystic Orb
customblocker.description: Even in the wizardlands, there's never anything good on TV. You'd think these guys would spring for cable.

customblocker.name: Bigonium Atom
customblocker.description: It's coming your way at near-relativistic speeds!

pedestal.name: Thaumatron Active
pedestal.text: Thaumatron active - careful within area of influence. Turn off all three levers for emergency shutoff.

pedestal.name: Thaumatron Active
pedestal.text: Thaumatron active - careful within area of influence. Turn off all three levers for emergency shutoff.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: 99 bottles of booze on the ground, 99 bottles of booze.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Careful not to step on one of these.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Monstruous Rutabaga Wine, popular with the trendy crowd.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Double Brandy, guaranteed to have a 120% alcohol rate.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Expired potions, mixed and blended with fruit, make for a nearly respectable drink.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Grognor's Anti-Wine. It has as much alcohol as regular wine.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: These are just some grape sodas.

customengraving.name: Wizardly Empties
customengraving.description: Hopefully there aren't any glass shards mixed up in there.

customblocker.name: Portal Controls
customblocker.description: The console reads 'ANYTHING BUT DIGGLE HELL'.

customblocker.name: Portal
customblocker.description: You hope whoever owns this place doesn't come back right now.

customblocker.name: Pocket Dimension Controls
customblocker.description: Oh. Well. This is awkward.
